name: Display All in One URLs
author: Galaxy Weblinks

sections.description:
‘Display All in One URLs’ act as your personal website navigator, displaying a list of URLs for all your posts, pages, and custom post types.

Features of Display All in One URLs:
* It allows you to quickly check all of your website URLs to ensure they are using valid characters.
* let’s say you’re planning on moving your website to a new URL, or perhaps you would like to update many of your website’s existing URLs for better SEO or accessibility. This plugin gives you a quick and easy way to view all website URLs on one single screen.
* You can customize your list of URLs by page, post, custom post type, or get all URLs.
* There is also a new option that can turn the list of generated URLs into clickable hyperlinks.

If you come across any bugs or have any suggestions, please email or contact us at vivek.jha@galaxyweblinks.in
sections.installation:
This plugin can be installed directly from your site.

  1. Log in and navigate to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Type “Display All in One URLs” into the Search and hit Enter.
  3. Locate the Display All in One URLs plugin in the list of search results and click Install Now.
  4. Once installed, click the Activate link.
  5. Go to Settings > Display All URLs within the admin panel to generate an ordered list of all website URLs.

It can also be installed manually.

  1. Upload the folder to /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin via the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. To enable the plugin options go in the admin Display All in One URLs menu.
  4. Go to Settings > Display All URLs within the admin panel to generate an ordered list of all website URLs.
sections.faq:
How to use the Display All in One URLs Plugin for display List of all URLs?

Go to Settings > Display All URLs within the admin panel to display an ordered list of all URLs.

short_description: Creates a page in the admin panel under Settings > Display All URLs that outputs an ordered list of all of the website's published URLs.
